murky.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: dark and difficult to see through
murky.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The laws on intellectual property are murky.
the murky waters  (=complicated subject) of sexuality and jealousy
murky.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: involving dishonest or illegal activities that are kept secret
murky.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: a murky world of fraud and secret deals
a politician with a murky past
